oneliner: A new kind of weather app
description: Discover a revolutionary way to interact with weather updates. With SkyWise, you're not just getting a forecast; you're gaining a personal meteorologist right in your pocket. Curious about weekend plans? Ask if it's a good day for a barbecue. Unsure about your outfit? Inquire about the best shoes for the day. With its intuitive chat interface, SkyWise tailors responses to your specific queries.
